question: What are Ms. SWATHI K's educational qualifications?

answer: Ms. SWATHI K has a substantial teaching experience. She served as a Lecturer in the E&E Department at Canara Engineering College, Mangaluru, from May 2008 to September 2013. From October 2013 to July 2022, she worked as an Assistant Professor in the E&E Department at the same institution. Later, from August 2022 to July 2023, she served as an Assistant Professor in the E&C Department at Canara Engineering College, Mangaluru. Since July 2023, she has been working as an Assistant Professor in the E&E Department at NMAMIT Nitte.

question: Tell me more about Dr. Nayana Shetty.
answer: Dr. Nayana Shetty is a dedicated academic and researcher with a strong background in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, with a focus on Renewable Energy, Power System, Power Electronics, and Control System. She holds a Ph.D. and M.Tech in Power and Energy System from NITK Surathkal and a B.E. in Electrical and Electronics from Mangalore University. Dr. Shetty has served at NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte, in various capacities, including Lecturer, Senior Lecturer, Assistant Professor, and Associate Professor. Her areas of interest include Renewable Energy, Power System, Power Electronics, and Control System. Dr. Shetty has been involved in numerous departmental responsibilities, including coordinating student performance monitoring, R&D, placement committees, and serving as a member of various committees and boards. She has also been actively involved in organizing and participating in national and international conferences, workshops, and faculty development programs. Her contributions to the field have been recognized through her professional memberships, including being a life member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and the Indian Society of Systems for Science & Engineering (ISSE). Dr. Shetty's expertise spans a wide range of subjects, including Solid State Drives, Power Electronics, Control System, Fuzzy Logic Control, Advanced Control System, Transmission and Distribution System, Electrical Measurement and Measuring Instruments, Electrical Power Generation, Switch Gear and Protection, Digital Electronic Circuit, Power System analysis and stability, Basic Electrical Engineering, Non Conventional Energy Systems, Linear System Theory, Industrial Management, Electrical Estimation & Economics. Her work has been recognized through various achievements, including serving as a technical program committee member in international conferences and as a question paper setter for VTU and MAHE University. Dr. Shetty's dedication to advancing knowledge in her areas of interest and her commitment to education and research make her a valuable asset to the field of Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

question: Tell me more about Dr. NAGESH PRABHU
answer: Dr. NAGESH PRABHU is a distinguished academic and researcher in the field of Power Systems and Power Electronics. With a Ph.D. from the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) Bangalore and a M.Tech from Karnataka Regional Engineering College, Surathkal, he has a rich academic background. His career spans various prestigious institutions, including N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology, Nitte, Canara Engineering College, Bantwal, and Nitte Meenakshi Institute of Technology, Bangalore, where he has held positions ranging from Assistant Professor to Principal. Dr. Prabhu's areas of interest include Power System Dynamics and Control, HVDC, FACTS, Power Quality, and Custom Power Controllers, with a particular focus on Smart Grid Applications and the application of Machine Learning and AI techniques to Power Systems. He has been actively involved in faculty development programs, technical lectures, and research, contributing significantly to the field of power electronics and power systems.
